channel.title: Homepage on Paul Clist
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Ilgin Dogan

item.description: Testing the idea that a ‘hidden’ page is built but not linked to.

I am a Ph.D. candidate in Industrial Engineering and Operations Research (IEOR) the University of California, Berkeley (UCB). My academic advisors are Anil Aswani and Zuo-Jun Max Shen . Prior to joining UCB, I received B.S. and M.S. degrees in Industrial Engineering at the Middle East Technical University.
